title: Game Freezes Once/Game
body:
I've recently started having my game freeze for 1-2 seconds once a game.  Everything else is fine, just the freeze.  After the freeze, my ping drops rapidly from the thousands back to normal and the game continues as normal.

Has been a week or a little over since it started.  Any possible fixes?

Provider: Fidelity Communications
NA Server

replies.body:
It sounds like you could be running into an issue with a burst of packet loss/packet buffering to the server. This could very likely be caused by routing problems to the server, however, an incompatible local network setting is far more likely. Let's run through the [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, so as to ensure your network configurations are good. 

Let me know if those steps caused any change whatsoever.
